No weekend, all weakened. #lol
Cozy + smell of pancakes – alarm clock = Weekend.
I’ve always loved the ‘Weekend Update’ people.
I am always happy to meet my friend, and my friend is my weekend.
It’s the weekend, this is as dressed as I get!
No. I don’t want the weekend to be over.
When you are unemployed, weekends are seven days long.
It is going to be a weekend not only for you, It is going to be a weekend for your suits, shoes, files, laptops etc.
Hands up if you’re ready to do something you’ll regret this weekend. Go forth! You have my blessing.
It’s Thursday. I can smell the weekend from here.
Had an amazing weekend hanging with my pals.
The weekend is here. Let’s roll baby!
Weekends welcome warriors for social fun that starts on Friday. Share, Like, comment, and friend. Netiquette.
Why wait for the weekend to have fun?
I don’t want to build a life and career, where I spent five days a week waiting for the weekend. No!
A wild and crazy weekend involves sitting on the front porch, smoking a cigar, reading a book.
Stay strong. The weekend is coming soon.
Weekend enjoyment start… Happy Weekend!
I think of myself as a famous celebrity who, during the weekend, do selfies. Have a great Weekend!
If you must have the motivation, think of your paycheck on Friday. #weekend
The only limits in life are the ones you make. Enjoy the weekend!
If I do not return to the pulpit this weekend, millions of people will go to hell. #lol
No matter how stressful the week has been, the weekend has come and let the good things happen.
Give me books, French wine, fruit, fine weather and a little music. #itsweekend
Hope your weekends been full of sun and relaxation. #happyweekend
It’s a fine line between Saturday night and Sunday morning. Enjoy your holidays!
Eating is my main hobby now, and most of what I do on the weekend revolves around that.
Always strive to excel, but only on weekends. Have a nice weekend!
Be in the habit of getting up bright and early on the weekends. Why waste such precious time in bed?
Happy Weekend! Wishing you a weekend full of love and laughter!
Weekends are a bit like rainbows; they look good from a distance but disappear when you get up close to them.
The weekends are too short for sleep!
There aren’t enough days in the weekend.
I would like to thank God and Ice Cube for Friday!
Better days are coming. They are called: Saturday and Sunday.
I hate weekends because there is no stock market.
I jog up to the Hollywood sign every weekend. It’s fun and what a view! #indreams
Nothing in the world is more expensive than a woman who’s free for the weekend.
A weekend in Vegas without gambling and drinking is just like being a born-again Christian.
Weekends don’t count unless you spend them doing something completely pointless.
My goal this weekend is to move… just enough so people don’t think I’m dead.
I have been known to hang out and party back in the day. I had a weekend that lasted a few years.
You know what I want to do? Wake up one weekend and not have to go anywhere and do nothing.
The only reason why we ask other people how their weekend was is so we can tell them about our own weekend.
I work mostly during the week, and on the weekend I get to hang out with friends, so it balances out pretty well.
I’m learning the power of going away for the weekend and keeping myself company.
